---
title: "Biomarker analysis using pROC package"
---

This README documents the pipeline used for generation of ROC-AUC value using pROC package

```{r}
#Load the required packages
library(pROC)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
# Read the count matrix
data <- read_excel("expression_counts.xlsx")
```

```{r}
# Extract gene expression and sample labels
gene_expression <- data$Gene
labels <- data$Condition
```

```{r}
# Compute ROC and AUC
roc_curve <- roc(labels, gene_expression)
auc_value <- auc(roc_curve)
print(paste("AUC:", auc_value))
```
